about_journey_title: My Journey as a Fullstack Developer
about_paragraph_1: My web development adventure began at IES Hermanos Machado in Seville, where I built a solid foundation in programming and the architectures that bring the modern web to life. This training was the springboard that launched me into the professional world of fullstack development.
about_paragraph_2: At SURLABS, I had the opportunity to apply my knowledge in a real environment, developing custom plugins for eLearning platforms. I learned to transform what the business needs into technical solutions that make the experience easier and more useful for thousands of users, using modern technologies like React and PHP.
about_paragraph_3: Currently, my focus is on the React ecosystem and exploring the potential of Artificial Intelligence to create smarter and more personalized applications. As a fullstack developer based in Seville, Spain, I am committed to modern web development and industry best practices.
projects_thundermail_description: AI application for drafting and suggesting personalized emails, editable before automatic sending. Main project demonstrating artificial intelligence integration with intuitive user interfaces.
projects_przone_description: Complete web application developed as final project for the Web Application Development cycle, allowing users to track their gym workouts.
projects_view_all_github: View all my projects on GitHub
projects_modal_paragraph_1: This project, ThunderMail, includes backend functionality designed for users to send AI-generated emails directly from the application.
projects_modal_paragraph_2: During development, I identified a fundamental conflict between the flexibility I wanted to offer and standard security practices. The initial version allowed the sender field (from) to be defined by the user. However, this creates a serious security vulnerability known as email spoofing, which would allow a malicious user to send emails impersonating someone else.
